alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Nelson; Pembina; Ramsey; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 11:29PM CDT until July 23 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BENSON...SOUTHEASTERN CAVALIER...NORTHWESTERN NELSON...RAMSEY...WESTERN WALSH...NORTHEASTERN EDDY AND WESTERN PEMBINA COUNTIES... At 1129 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Akra to Spirit Lake Nation, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Akra, Mountain and Backoo around 1130 PM CDT. Hensel and Cavalier around 1135 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Hamar, Tolna, Hamilton and Pekin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Nelson; Pembina; Ramsey; Walsh
